name: Demon Bathhouse RL
description:
~~~ === DEMON BATHHOUSE RL === ~~~

Web Build available at https://neontropics.itch.io/demon-bathhouse-rl-web-build as well! (need to click full screen to be playable)

7DRL 2018 entry from NeonTropics

Heavily inspired by Spirited Away, try escape in this Demon Bathhouse as far as possible! It's a very puzzley roguelike so very few stats and heavy emphasis on tactics and movement.

TIP: Read the red tip text closely

Does not save the current run when exiting, but runs are pretty short and it does save your overall "furthest escape" as a high score to try to beat.

Best played 720p to 1080p

Release notes:

v 0.98
-----------------------
* Added more and clearer Tip texts

v 0.97
-----------------------
* Initial 7DRL 2018 version!
